TextBody:
Hi Ashish,

1) Based upon the information provided, it seems as though you would want the Active Directory Permissions Analyzer solution for NEA (NAA) which it does not appear as though you do based upon what I see in your account in Salesforce.

In NEA (NAA) if you navigate to "Help" > "About" in the popup you would see "Active Directory Permissions"


2) Here is link to our online documentation for the AD Permissions Analyzer solution:
Active Directory Permissions Analyzer Solution

https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Solutions/ActiveDirectoryPermissionsAnalyzer/Overview.htm


3) Please let me know if I am mis-interpreting your question/inquiry.


Thank you,
Mike Candon
Senior Technical Support Engineer

Our professional services team would have to build this report as referenced in the ticket under a Professional Service contract/agreement. To accomplish this, we will need to get on a call with Professional Services and yourself to ensure the scope of the request is agreed upon.
